main event: A pilot observed a bright metallic object at high altitude over Brookley AFB in Alabama, which moved at high speed and changed direction abruptly.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 25 minutes,The object was seen at approximately 30,000 feet and around 4-5 miles east of the observer,It appeared larger than an aircraft and had a silvery metallic color,No other aircraft were in the vicinity during the sighting,The pilot described the object as looking like nothing he had ever seen before.
sighted object: a bright metallic object in the sky
